description: Defines data models related to Bluetooth devices, connection states, device status snapshots, and user settings in the application.

classes.name: DeviceSummary
classes.description: A lightweight representation of a Bluetooth device for UI/persistence.

classes.name: ConnectionState
classes.description: Enumeration of possible connection states shown in UI.

classes.name: DeviceStatus
classes.description: Snapshot of the currently connected device and its best-effort capabilities.

classes.name: UserSettings
classes.description: Data class representing user preferences and settings stored locally.
